price: 29. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Xurmoo idil waxaa iska leh oo ceeb iyo nuqsaan ka hufan Rabbigeen. Waxaanu nahay gar diid.
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
